com.ephesoft.dcma.webservice.exceptionhandler

Interface RestErrorConverter<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the generic type RestError object into another object that is potentially better suited for HTTP response rendering by an HttpMessageConverter.
    All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter<RestError,T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapRestErrorConverter

    public interface RestErrorConverter<T>
extends org.springframework.core.convert.converter.Converter<RestError,T>
    A RestErrorConverter is an intermediate 'bridge' component in the response rendering pipeline: it converts a.
